entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
